title: Platebody

properties.name: description
properties.value: A platebody is a type of armour worn mainly by warriors. Among melee attack types, platebody provides good defence against the slash attack type but is more vulnerable to the crush attack type.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Platebody
This article is about Platebody items. For Chainbody items, see Chainbody. For other uses, see Body.
Platebody
SlotBody slot
TypeMelee

A platebody is a type of armour worn mainly by warriors. Among melee attack types, platebody provides good defence against the slash attack type but is more vulnerable to the crush attack type.

Platebodies give players penalties towards ranged attacks and penalties towards magic defence. However, platebodies have very good defence against ranged as well as melee attacks.

Platebodies are made with the Smithing skill or purchased at platebody shops, which is identified by the icon on the map. This piece of armour will interfere with Ava's accumulator and Ava's attractor.
